Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

5 hours ago - Amazon sells many products under its own brand names, including phone chargers, batteries, and diaper wipes. The AmazonBasics brand was introduced in 2009, and now features hundreds of product lines, including smartphone cases, computer mice, batteries, dumbbells, and dog crates.
